Keywords: Black Order , Cosmic , Deity , Eternal , Infinity Watch , Minions of Thanos , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Thanos
Special Powers
BEHOLD THE ULTIMATE POWER IN THE UNIVERSE: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 and choose a number of Infinity Gem effect(s) equal to half the result from the list below that were not chosen last turn. Thanos can use the chosen effect(s) until your next turn.
*POWER - Close Combat Expert, Range Combat Expert.
*TIME - Probability Control, Super Senses.
*REALITY - Barrier, Smoke Cloud. Thanos may use both as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker.
*SOUL - Steal Energy, but with close and range attacks. Regeneration as FREE.
*MIND - Mind Control as FREE. When Thanos uses it, he has Improved Targeting: Hindering, Elevated, Blocking, Characters, Adjacent.
*SPACE - Phasing/Teleport. Phasing/Teleport as FREE, but only to move up to 6 squares.
I AM A GOD: Thanos has Cosmic Energy team ability. // Thanos can reduce penetrating damage.
Linked Units

The contested symbol is meant to be "Ignores Blocking" not "Destroys Blocking", as the following listing from the WIN Rules Forum clarifies. [url]https://win.wizkids.com/bb/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=16201&sid=7166e699baf3f3407d10030f60eaf195[/url]

March 30, 2022
Hellboy the Bellboy
@Carlos Mucha 1. Yes, picking Gems. 2. Whenever something refers to "half the result" it's always been rounded up. (Just think of it as rolling 1d3) 3. "Reduce penetrating damage" means that if he has a reducer and would be dealt penetrating damage he can reduce it. (Psychic Blast, Exploit Weakness, various special powers or traits that mention "penetrating damage")

March 27, 2022
Taliesin
Piece has Improved Targeting Destroy Blocking, not Improved Targeting Blocking. There is a starbust printed on his improved blocking (use a magnifying glass if you can't see it); so he can't mind control through all the walls on realm of death, sorry.

February 13, 2022
tyroclix
I was curious to what level of borkenness this would be and facing it, I can say it is a solid reminder WK does not have the designers to make a balanced game. This piece has too many rules it breaks and the only way to beat it is either horrid / great dice rolls and/or using other broken stuff. Free anything should be limited - it ain't. Ignoring anything should be limited. It ain't. MC from 10 out and even when based means Thanos' low damage output is irrelevant - every turn he is getting your good stuff to attack your stuff, running them back to their starting areas and he is completely immune to terrain effects. Then he can phase away. At this point he has not used a single action. He can still just target and deal damage from 10 out afterwards. Reducing pen damage and making him unoutwittable makes his dial feel even longer than it is. If you can get across the board in a turn and if you can give Thanos immobile and if you can fire off multiple huge damage attacks, you can drop him. But once again, WK gives the local venues the middle finger (NPE / Drive out players) with the expectation they can extract as much cash from those players who enjoy their mastubatory fun.
February 4, 2022
pokolo
this may actually be the best legacy card upgrade to date... they gave this guy so much. he can do so much. if you don't build with facing him in mind you're gonna have problems. he's stupid broken meta good. reminds me a bit of the WoS Cosmic-Spidey when he came out back in the day, but at nearly half the value, meaning you can actually play him in 300 point games and give him adequate support. A Thanos figure worthy of the name.

December 22, 2021
Buckwheat
The Soul Gem is where it's at. FREE Regeneration means that he's healing an average of 2 clicks per turn. On top of 11 clicks of life, Steal Energy from range, and damage reducers that are protected from penetrating damage and Outwit, KO'ing him is going to require a lot of effort. Roll higher than a 2, for his Trait, and he comes an absolute powerhouse.
